title: Start or Sit (NFC); Barkley or Gibson Rest of Season? (09/17 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Reacting to a surprisingly awesome Giants-Football Team game (1:30)! Which starting RB would we rather have rest of season? Are Sterling Shepard and Daniel Jones legit? We also give you a perplexing Tyler Lockett stat (16:30) and your news and notes (17:15) ... Beat the Waiver Wire (23:00)! We'll give you some intriguing players to stash like Marquez Valdes-Scantling and Larry Rountree. And then we've got the Startometer (26:00) for Vikings-Cardinals, Lions-Packers and Titans-Seahawks ... Start or Sit for Falcons-Bucs (29:30), 49ers-Eagles (40:40), Saints-Panthers (49:10), Bengals-Bears (53:00), Vikings-Cardinals (56:50), Lions-Packers (1:00:30) and Titans-Seahawks (1:04:00) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Start or Sit (NFC); Barkley or Gibson Rest of Season? (09/17 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We react to the ridiculous Giants and debate Barkley vs. Gibson. Are we starting Julio? Edmonds? Jameis? Mike Davis?
